channel.title: [FM] Valkyria Chronicles Forum Mafia - signups thread - (29/29)
channel.description:
https://assets1.ignimgs.com/2018/09/18/valkyriachronicles4-1280-1537312016800_400w.jpg
# [color]Rules:[/color]
* [color=ligblue]Moderators》[/color]@eevee_bot and @eevee_bot. Send all actions to them. * [color=lightblue]Respect》[/color] Be respectful, if you don't know what's in the boundries and what is out then ask the Moderators
* [color=ligblue]Mod Messages》[/color]Do not quote or post any messages from the moderator.
* [color=lightblue]Flavour》[/color]Flavour is based on Valkyria Chronicles game series. Flavour is important to pay attention to.
* [color=ligblue]Lynch》[/color]The lynch is plurality based. In the event of a tie, a random player is decided upon.
* [color=lightblue]Voting》[/color]Vote in a seperate paragraph not in spoilers and bold. Otherwise, we have no obligation to count it.
* [color=ligblue] ITA》[/color]ITAs will exist [color=red]ONLY IF GAME WILL FILL COMPLETLY[/color] (And will be removed if not). ITA times will be announced at the start of each game day. Each class will have different statistics when it comes to ITAs. A table explaining this will be posted before the game starts if a number of players required for ITAs is reached.
* [color=lightblue]Shooting》[/color]Typing /shoot name in the thread with the name being the player (other than you) you wish to shoot.
* [color=ligblue]Flips》[/color]When a player dies under regular conditions their rolecard will be revealed in the thread. Any hidden information will be revealed in the card. The source of the the kill will not be revealed.
* [color=lightblue]Leaders, setup and action processing》[/color]There will be a lot of power roles in this setup. However, there will be a maximum of active actions which each non-scum faction can submit. This limit is twice the number of alive players with "leader" passive. If this limit is exceeded - **ALL ACTIONS OF THIS FACTION WILL FAIL**.
* [color=ligblue]Replacements》[/color]If a slot needs to be replaced and their is no immediate replacement then that slot will be modkilled. Players seeking to use this for their factions advantage will receive extra punishment.
* [color=lightblue]Spam》[/color]Duo to the large nature of the game please try and keep everything in a limit number of posts as opposed to multiple quick one-liners.
* [color=ligblue]Events》[/color]Each day (at least in the beginning, no promises on D42) there will be at minimum one event per day. An event may be small contest or a large scale object, each offers an incentive to participate from rewards to not dying. If an event launches that needs sign ups then /join is required to particpate.
## [color]Players:[/color] 1. GamerPoke 2. PKR 3. Icibalus 4. Luxy 5. Solic 6. Wazza 7. Margaret 8. MaximusPrime 9. Firekitten 10. Insanity 11. BlueStorm 12. H_Hjasik 13. DatBird 14. Alice 15. Meteoro 16. Captain 17. PoisonedSquid 18. Geyde 19. orangeandblack5 20. Marcus 21. MathBlade 22. Zone_Q 23. NinjaPenguin 24. Sam17z 25. psychoneirik 26. Soulshade55r 27. Frostwolf103 28. Mercenary 29. TeenierTub
## [color]Graveyard:[/color] 1. 2. 3.

item.title: [FM] Valkyria Chronicles Forum Mafia - signups thread - (29/29)
item.dc:creator: Zone_Q11
item.description:
Mercenary:
  • europe is divided in three factions: a blue one I forgot the name, the empire and gallia

Blues are Atlantic Federation. They might be a Federation, but from what I see they are as evil as the Empire. Rather, while the Empire has its own agenda, the traitors in Gallia and the Federation are the ones who brings the pain in the rear.

Guess what happened in VC2? Civil war. Reason: Racial discrimination. Gamebreaker element: Artificial Valkyrias (basically a demi-god). Guess what? Apparently no soldiers are sent out to solve this mess because this war was not related to other countries. What is the solution according to the state (Gallia) itself? Send cadets (noob soldiers) to fight! “What could possibly go wrong?”

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Valkyria Chronicles Forum Mafia - signups thread - (29/29)
